conclusion: Need to understand the flow of liquid through the baffles to determine which container it will flow into.
Baffles are labeled A, B, and C; containers are labeled D and E.
Liquid flows through baffle A and is directed towards container D.
Liquid flows through baffle B and is directed towards container E.
Liquid flows through baffle C and is directed towards container E.
Liquid will flow into respective containers based on the baffle it passes through.
Liquid from baffle A will flow into container D.
Liquid from baffle B and C will flow into container E.
Final answer is D and E respectively.
